attributes.description:
This 2.4 Hilux extra cab has a full-service history and is a fuel effiecient vehicle. It comes with a towbar as well as rubberising.

MyRide will find the ride of your dreams, supported by exceptional customer service and countrywide delivery of all our new and pre-owned vehicles. Our team has decades of experience in the automotive industry and represents some of the greatest brands in the world. For your peace of mind, we pay attention to the smallest details to provide you with quality vehicles that keep you and your family safe. Our skilled sales staff provide excellent customer service, whilst our in-house finance experts ensure you get the best offer to suit your budget. We encourage test drives and welcome all trade-ins. Contact us today to find your ride with MyRide. We promise to make your vehicle purchasing experience seamless and convenient.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0872502162. WARRANTY VALID UNTIL 2023 OR 100 000 KM'S. 
THIS DATSUN GO 1.2 MID IS ONE OF THE MOST PRACTICAL, FUEL EFFICIENT AND CONVENIENT VEHICLES THAT YOU CAN FIND. IT IS EASY TO GET AROUND THE CITY AND GET INTO TIGHT PARKING SPACES. ITS 1.2 LITRE ENGINE PRODUCES 50 KW OF POWER AND 104 NM OF TORQUE. IT HAS A TOP SPEED OF 161 KM/PH. IT HAS MANUFACTURERS' CLAIMED FUEL CONSUMPTION FIGURES OF 5.5 LITRES PER 100 KM. THIS IS THE PERFECT VEHICLE TO COMPLETE YOUR ERRANTS AS IT OFFERS GREAT FUEL EFFICIENCY. 

ALL PRE-OWNED VEHICLES UNDERGO A STRINGENT AA MULTI-POINT CHECK AND AA ROADWORTHY BEFORE DELIVERY. WE DELIVER COUNTRYWIDE AND IT GETS EVEN BETTER, WE COME TO YOU. FINANCE AVAILABLE AND A TEST DRIVE IS A MUST. PRICE EXCLUDES LICENSE REGISTRATION, ADMINISTRATION, DELIVERY, AND ON THE ROAD FEES. *ERRORS AND OMISSIONS EXCEPTED
